channel.title: What video game[s] did you grow up with?
channel.description:
Well personally, im a large fan of old 90's video games, and i feel like there should be a thread of games that you grew up with, and still play. These two stand out for me :D
Descent 2 This game had the best soundtrack i think i have ever heared on a video game, it frightened the shit out of me and... well its still fun to play today. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wWI152X6n0E]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wWI152X6n0E[/url]
Earth worm jim [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5KA9S91A66k]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5KA9S91A66k[/url] Nothing much more to say ;)

item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Now-a-days, 6 year olds have advanced technology, iPod touches, etc.

and its bak for 3DS

item.title: What video game[s] did you grow up with?
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“OmgItsShane, post:16, topic:400684”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=497742.msg3639942#msg3639942 date=1308883943]

On Snes, The Mario game with the yoshi’s and feather (I’ll think of the name later). Mario world… sumtin.

Where you get a cape if you get the feather?

Yes what is the name!

Super Mario Bros. Look at the game I posted. Look familiar?
[/quote]
I failed so bad at that game.[/quote]
I was pro. Beat the game but my cousin came over and deleted the data. >:| He thought erase game was a type of game… he then proceeded to try and then play the other games listed…

Read full topic
